'''Alpha v1.0.9''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]], released on July 21, 2010,<ref name=:1>[[wordofnotch:840444777|Minecraft Alpha 1.0.9]] – The Word of Notch, July 21, 2010</ref> that made changes to animations and a [[sound]], and fixed a bug.

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''General'''
* The animation of the [[player]] and [[Mob (entity)|mobs]] has been changed so that their arms no longer flail around.

'''[[File:Cow JE1.png|32px]] [[Cow]]s'''
* Two sounds have been removed.

=== General ===
'''General'''
* The background of the pause menu has now been darkened.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed a stuttering bug.{{More info needed|What exactly?}}</onlyinclude>
